Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

NameDescription
bbq-jsbbq is a toolkit for building highly responsive web applications.
bbq-js-testThis module provides classes to use in your JavaScript unit tests.
bbq-compilerThe bbq-compiler parses include function calls out of js files and replaces them with the content of the included classes definition file. It also performs the same task with CSS files and language translations.
bbq-spring-integrationThis module helps you integration Spring with bbq.
bbq-spring-security-integrationThis module provides some helper classes to integrate your bbq application with Spring Security.
bbq-testProvides functionality for running JavaScript unit tests.
bbq-maven-plugins-
bbq-maven-archetypeA Maven Archetype to get your project off the ground quickly.
